summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL OUTLAW MOTORCYCLE HELMET, MODEL: TG-5. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 13E047000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 866-371-0281 APPROXIMATELY FOUR MONTHS AGO. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALL BACK, BUT DID NOT RECEIVE A RESPONSE. IN ADDITION, THE CONTACT SENT AN E-MAIL TO TEGOLINC@GMAIL.COM. THE CONTACT RECEIVED CORRESPONDENCE, BUT NO MATERIAL WAS SHIPPED IN REGARDS TO BEING REIMBURSED. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
